chapter.title: Overview
chapter.para: This plugin comes packaged with Clojure, a functional programming language targeted for the JVM.
The jars provided by this plugin are clojure-core 1.2.0 and clojure-contrib 1.1.0. Different jars can be used by configuring the plugin in the Plugin Options window.

chapter.title: Using with Console
chapter.para: If the Console plugin is installed, this plugin automatically sets the system environment variable CLOJURE to the path of clojure-core and clojure-contrib. So to run a script called 'script.clj', cd to the file's directory (cd $d) and run:

Alternatively, this plugin installs a clojure commando file, so scripts can be run by setting it as the interpreter for clojure files (Plugin Options -> Console -> Compile & Run), and then Plugins -> Console -> Run Current Buffer.
